data.actual_result: It does not truncate and the modal breaks. You can click the middle of the modal to be able to access the toggle.
data.expected_result: The username correctly truncates in the modal.
data.short_description: Long usernames break the Transfer Ownership modal
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a user with a long username such as "WWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW" - Go to Members in Server Settings - Right click on the user and click Transfer Ownership
